self_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry feels confident but acknowledges Alex has improved significantly. He plans to come in bigger and stronger for the match.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Jerry prefers opponents with longer arms, which Alex has.

Alex Kurdecha.strength: Alex has grown bigger and stronger, especially after his match against Georgi.
Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Alex lost to Dave Chaffee but then defeated Georgi convincingly.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry believes Morozov's absolute power and recent performances make him the favorite.

Vitalii Laletin.strength: Strong but may struggle against Morozov's power.
Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Lost to Dave Sheffield but has been competitive.

Artyom Morozov.strength: Extremely powerful, especially after a loss.
Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Defeated Georgi and has been dominant.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry roots for Todd but acknowledges Krasimir's strength, especially inside.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Krasimir's inside game vs. Todd's versatility.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Lost to Dadikyan but has been competitive.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry thinks Irakli's training with Levan gives him an edge.

Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Lost to Dadikyan and Ongarbaev but strong in practice.
